_meanings:
{@--1@} The offspring of a man
of the Brāhmaṇa and a woman of
the Vaiśya tribe;  
{#brAhmaRAdvESyakanyAyAmaMbazWo nAma jAyate#} <ls>Ms. 10. 8</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 10.">13</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 10.">15</ls>;
<ls>Y. 1. 91.</ls> (According to  
<ls>Ms. 10. 47</ls> the duty of an {#aMbazWa#} is the 
curing of diseases; {#aMbazWAnAM cikitsitaM#}).

{@--3@} (<ab>pl.</ab>) <ab>N.</ab> 

of a country and its inhabitants
(they seem to have occupied the
country to the east of Tāk, 
comprising the modern district of
Lahore).

<ab>N.</ab> of several plants:
({%a%}) {#gaRikA, yUTikA#} (<ab>Mar.</ab> {#juI#}); ({%b%})
{#pAWA#} (<ab>Mar.</ab> {#pAhAqamULa#}). ({%c%}) {#cukrikA#} (<ab>Mar.</ab>
{#cukA#}); ({%d%}) another plant (<ab>Mar.</ab>
{#aMbAqA#}).
